name: src/Board.js
Board
description: This class holds the pins of the components.

name: constructor
description: Initialises the fields

name: components
description: A dictionary of components, id => component

name: grid
description: Grid which holds the pins of components

name: pins
description: A dictionary, position => pins

name: add
description:
Adds a component to the board and adds the position to
the respective component pins. Returns component id.

name: remove
description:
Removes the given component from the board and also
removes the position from the respective pins

name: src/CircuitUpdater.js
CircuitUpdater
description:
Singleton class.
Responsible for updating the circuit components with the given solution from the Solver

name: getUpdateObject
description: Creates and returns an object which has all the new values to update the components

name: update
description: Calls each component's update() method

name: src/Components/Capacitor.js
Capacitor
description:
Utilising Norton Companion Model and Trapezoidal Approximation
for Transient Analysis

name: stamp
description: Stamps the Y and J matrices

name: update
description:
Updates this component's dependant values and pins' voltage.
Called from CircuitUpdater update() method

name: src/Components/Component.js
Component
description: Component class

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of Component.

name: id
description: Id of the component. Example: I1, R2, V3...

name: label
description: User defined label - not used at the moment

name: type
description: Type of component. Example: Source, Resistor...

name: controlled
description: Object that holds the variables that are user-controlled

name: dependant
description: Object that holds the variables that are calculated from the analysis

name: pins
description: Array of this component's pins

name: nodes
description: The nodes this component's pins are connected to

name: otherPins
description: Returns an array of the other pins aside from the pin index provided

name: stamp
description: Stamps the Y and J matrices

name: update
description: Updates the component's dependant field and the pins' voltage

name: src/ComponentType.js
src/Matrix.js
Matrix
description:
Instead of inheriting from Array type, I wrapped an
array in Matrix class. Array inheritance is still not
supported properly in transpilation. The problem I had 
is that the inherited Array will always be returned,
rather than the derived's instance.
See: https://babeljs.io/docs/usage/caveats/

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of Matrix.

name: data
description: Representation of the matrix

name: addRow
description: Adds a 0-filled row to the matrix

name: addCol
description: Adds a 0-filled column to the matrix

name: rowToCol
description: Converts row matrix to column matrix and returns it

name: src/SimulationConfig.js
src/Simulator.js
src/Solver.js
Solver
description:
Solver class of the simulator.
Creates the matrices and initiates the stamping, and solve using NumericJS' LUsolve method.

name: simConfig
description: Key-value object that holds the config for this simulation

name: LU_Y
description: Stores the LU decomposed Y matrix result object from Numeric.LU()

name: getNumVSource
description: Gets the number of voltage sources

name: stampMatrices
description: Stamps Y and J matrices with the values of the components

name: solve
description:
In MNA, we have three matrices Yx = J.
This method solves the circuit by calculating the values for
matrix x and returns it.

name: src/Traverser.js
Traverser
description:
Singleton class.
Traverses components on the circuit board using BFS to assign Node numbers to each
component so that MNA (Modified Nodal Analysis) can later be applied onto the circuit.

name: constructor
description: Empty constructor

name: resetVisited
description: Resets the visited flag of all components' pins to FALSE.

name: assignNode
description:
Assigns the pin to a node by placing it on the nodeIndex of the nodes array
i.e. nodes array get mutated.

name: flagVisited
description: Changes the visited flag of a pin to TRUE.

name: enqueue
description:
We are using BFS Graph traversal.
This places unvisited pin(s) of a component into a queue to come back later.

name: getPrearrangedNodes
description:
Returns 'prearrangedNodes', a 2D array of Pins.
The first index denotes the n-th Node that we will be using for MNA.
The second index denotes the Pin in that node. We store Pin rather 
than Component, because Pin has 'parent' and 'index' field: parent is the
Component that 'owns' it, and 'index' is the n-th Pin of the parent.

nodes[0] array is expected to be empty, because we will later move all
nodes with Ground to nodes[0] and clear up empty nodes.

name: AEF
description:
AEF stands for Assign-Enqueue-Flag, used in the recursive BFS in
getPrearrangedNodes() method.

name: finaliseNodes
description:
Supposed to run with the nodes from getPrearrangedNodes()
This method moves all nodes that have Ground component to nodes[0]
and removes the empty nodes.

name: getNodes
description: Returns the final nodes array, ready to be assigned to the components.

name: assignComponentNodes
description: This method assigns the FINAL node number into the Components' nodes field.
